title: Preserve
text: To preserve and make freely available lesser known or understudied literary and historical texts from the Near East.

title: Research
text: To develop a new hybrid model of rigorous training in the core skills associated with historical and literary research, coupled with essential competencies in computer literacy.

title: Develop
text: To further the advancement of digital humanities as a field in order to foster much needed technical skills in graduate and undergraduate humanities students.
